Medic.description: Support trooper. Heals nearby biological units.

Reaper.description: Raider. Capable of jumping up and down cliffs. Throws explosive mines.

Hellion.description: Fast scout. Has a flame attack that damages all enemy units in its line of fire.

Vulture.description: Fast skirmish unit. Can use the Spider Mine ability.

Diamondback.description: Fast, high-damage hovertank. Rail Gun can fire while the Diamondback is moving.

Siege Tank.description: Heavy tank. Long-range artillery in Siege Mode.

Medivac.description: Air transport. Heals nearby biological units.

Wraith.description: Highly mobile flying unit. Excellent at surgical strikes.

Viking.description:
Durable support flyer. Loaded with strong anti-capital air missiles. 
Can switch into Assault Mode to attack ground units.

Ghost.description: Infiltration unit. Can use Snipe and Cloak abilities. Can also call down Tactical Nukes.

Spectre.description:
Infiltration unit. Can use Ultrasonic Pulse, Psionic Lash, and Cloak. 
Can also call down Tactical Nukes.

Liberator.description:
Artillery fighter. Loaded with missiles that deal area damage to enemy air targets. 
Can switch into Defender Mode to provide siege support.

Valkyrie.description:
Advanced anti-aircraft fighter. 
Able to use cluster missiles that deal area damage to air targets.

Widow Mine.description:
Robotic mine. Launches missiles at nearby enemy units while burrowed. 
Attacks deal splash damage in a small area around the target. 
Widow Mine is revealed when Sentinel Missile is on cooldown.

Cyclone.description: Mobile assault vehicle. Can use Lock On to quickly fire while moving.

Warhound.description: Anti-vehicle mech. Haywire missiles do bonus damage to mechanical units.

Sky Fury.description:
Durable Royal Guard support flyer. Loaded with strong anti-capital air missiles. 
Can switch into Assault Mode to attack ground units.

Shock Division.description: Royal Guard Heavy tank. Long-range artillery in Siege Mode.

Progressive Terran Infantry Weapon.description:
Increases damage of Terran infantry.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Infantry Armor.description:
Increases armor of Terran infantry.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Vehicle Weapon.description:
Increases damage of Terran vehicles.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Vehicle Armor.description:
Increases armor of Terran vehicles.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Ship Weapon.description:
Increases damage of Terran starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Ship Armor.description:
Increases armor of Terran starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Weapon Upgrade.description:
Increases damage of Terran units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases armor of Terran units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Infantry Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Terran infantry.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Vehicle Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Terran vehicles.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Ship Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Terran starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Terran Weapon/Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Terran units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Projectile Accelerator (Bunker).description: Increases range of all units in the Bunker by 1.

Neosteel Bunker (Bunker).description: Increases the number of Bunker slots by 2.

Hellstorm Batteries (Missile Turret).description: The Missile Turret unleashes an additional flurry of missiles with each attack.

Advanced Construction (SCV).description: Multiple SCVs can construct a structure, reducing its construction time.

Progressive Fire-Suppression System (Ter.description:
Level 1: While on low health, Terran structures are repaired to half health instead of burning down.
Level 2: Terran structures are repaired to full health instead of half health.

Progressive Orbital Command (Deprecated).description:
Deprecated. Replaced by Scanner Sweep, MULE, and Orbital Module (Planetary Fortress)
Level 1: Allows Command Centers to use Scanner Sweep and Calldown: MULE abilities.
Level 2: Orbital Command abilities work even in Planetary Fortress mode.

Progressive Stimpack (Marine).description:
Level 1: Stimpack: Increases unit movement and attack speed for 15 seconds. Injures the unit for 10 life.
Level 2: Super Stimpack: Instead of injuring the unit, heals the unit for 30 life instead.

Advanced Medic Facilities (Medic).description: Medics can be trained from a Barracks without an attached Tech Lab.

Stabilizer Medpacks (Medic).description: Increases Medic heal speed. Reduces the amount of energy required for each heal.

Concussive Shells (Marauder).description: Marauder attack temporarily slows all units in target area.

U-238 Rounds (Reaper).description:
Increases Reaper pistol attack range by 1.
Reaper pistols do additional 3 damage to Light Armor.

G-4 Clusterbomb (Reaper).description: Timed explosive that does heavy area damage.

Laser Targeting System (Marine).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Magrail Munitions (Marine).description: Deals 20 damage to target unit. Autocast on attack with a cooldown.

Restoration (Medic).description:
Medics gain the Restoration ability, 
which removes negative status effects from a target allied unit.

Optical Flare (Medic).description:
Medics gain the Optical Flare ability, 
which reduces vision range of target enemy unit. Disables detection.

Resource Efficiency (Medic).description: Reduces Medic cost by 25 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Progressive Stimpack (Firebat).description:
Level 1: Stimpack: Increases unit movement and attack speed for 15 seconds. Injures the unit for 20 life.
Level 2: Super Stimpack: Instead of injuring the unit, heals the unit for 60 life instead.

Resource Efficiency (Firebat).description: Reduces Firebat cost by 50 minerals and 1 supply.

Progressive Stimpack (Marauder).description:
Level 1: Stimpack: Increases unit movement and attack speed for 15 seconds. Injures the unit for 20 life.
Level 2: Super Stimpack: Instead of injuring the unit, heals the unit for 60 life instead.

Laser Targeting System (Marauder).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Magrail Munitions (Marauder).description: Deals 20 damage to target unit. Autocast on attack with a cooldown.

Internal Tech Module (Marauder).description: Marauders can be trained from a Barracks without an attached Tech Lab.

Hostile Environment Adaptation (SCV).description: Increases SCV life by 15 and attack speed slightly.

Adaptive Medpacks (Medic).description: Allows Medics to heal mechanical and air units.

Infernal Pre-Igniter (Firebat).description: Firebats do an additional 4 damage to Light Armor.

Jet Pack Overdrive (Reaper).description:
Allows the Reaper to fly for 10 seconds.
While flying, the Reaper can attack air units.

Infernal Plating (Hellion).description: Increases Hellion and Hellbat armor by 2.

Resource Efficiency (Goliath).description: Reduces Goliath cost by 50 minerals and 1 supply.

Internal Tech Module (Goliath).description: Goliaths can be trained from a Factory without an attached Tech Lab.

Resource Efficiency (Siege Tank).description: Reduces Siege Tank cost by 25 gas and 1 supply.

Phase Cloak (Predator).description: Allows Predators to briefly cloak. Predators ignore unit collision while cloaked.

Concussive Charge (Predator).description: Allows Predators to intercept enemy ground units, and applies an AoE slow on arrival.

Progressive Stimpack (Reaper).description:
Level 1: Stimpack: Increases unit movement and attack speed for 15 seconds. Injures the unit for 10 life.
Level 2: Super Stimpack: Instead of injuring the unit, heals the unit for 30 life instead.

Laser Targeting System (Reaper).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Spider Mines (Reaper).description: Allows Reapers to lay Spider Mines. 3 charges per Reaper.

Combat Drugs (Reaper).description: Reapers regenerate life while out of combat.

Hellbat Aspect (Hellion).description: Allows Hellions to transform into Hellbats.

Smart Servos (Hellion).description: Transforms faster between modes. Hellions can attack while moving.

Jump Jets (Hellion).description:
Increases movement speed in Hellion mode.
In Hellbat mode, launches the Hellbat toward enemy ground units and briefly stuns them.

Progressive Stimpack (Hellion).description:
Level 1: Stimpack: Increases unit movement and attack speed for 15 seconds. Injures the unit for 20 life.
Level 2: Super Stimpack: Instead of injuring the unit, heals the unit for 60 life instead.

Auto Launchers (Vulture).description: Allows Vultures to attack while moving.

Jump Jets (Goliath).description: Allows Goliaths to jump up and down cliffs.

Burst Capacitors (Diamondback).description:
While not attacking, the Diamondback charges its weapon. 
The next attack does 10 additional damage.

Resource Efficiency (Diamondback).description: Reduces Diamondback cost by 50 gas and 1 supply.

Jump Jets (Siege Tank).description:
Repositions Siege Tank to a target location. 
Can be used in either mode and to jump up and down cliffs.

Spider Mines (Siege Tank).description:
Allows Siege Tanks to lay Spider Mines. 
Lays 3 Spider Mines at once. 3 charges.

Graduating Range (Siege Tank).description:
Increases the Siege Tank's attack range by 1 every 3 seconds while in Siege Mode, 
up to a maximum of 5 additional range.

Laser Targeting System (Siege Tank).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Advanced Siege Tech (Siege Tank).description: Siege Tanks gain +3 armor in Siege Mode.

Internal Tech Module (Siege Tank).description: Siege Tanks can be trained from a Factory without an attached Tech Lab.

Resource Efficiency (Predator).description: Reduces Predator cost by 75 gas and 1 supply.

Afterburners (Medivac).description: Ability. Temporarily increases the Medivac's movement speed by 70%.

Advanced Laser Technology (Wraith).description:
Burst Lasers do more damage and can hit both ground and air targets.
Replaces Gemini Missiles weapon.

Anti-Mechanical Munition (Viking).description: Increases Viking damage to mechanical units while in Assault Mode.

Resource Efficiency (HERC).description: Reduces HERC cost by 25 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Progressive Transport Hook (Siege Tank).description:
Level 1: Allows Siege Tanks to be transported in Siege Mode.
Level 2: Siege Tanks in Siege Mode can attack air units while transported by a Medivac.

Enhanced Combustion Engines (Siege Tank).description: Increases movement speed of Siege Tanks in Tank Mode.

Rapid Reignition Systems (Medivac).description:
Increases slightly Medivac movement speed.
Reduces Medivac's Afterburners ability cooldown.

Behemoth Reactor (Battlecruiser).description: All Battlecruiser spells require 25 less energy to cast.

Guerilla Missiles (Liberator).description: Liberators in Fighter Mode apply an attack and movement debuff to enemies they attack.

Resource Efficiency (Widow Mine).description: Reduces Widow Mine cost by 25 gas and 1 supply.

Grapple Pull (HERC).description: Allows HERCs to use their grappling gun to pull a ground unit towards the HERC.

Scanner Sweep (Command Center).description: Temporarily reveals an area of the map, detecting cloaked and burrowed units.

MULE (Command Center).description: Summons a unit that gathers minerals more quickly than regular SCVs. Has timed life.

Extra Supplies (Command Center).description: Drops additional supplies, permanently increasing the supply output of the target Supply Depot by 8.

Twin-Linked Flamethrower (Hellion).description: Doubles the width of the Hellion's flame attack.

Thermite Filaments (Hellion).description: Hellions do an additional 10 damage to Light Armor.

Cerberus Mine (Spider Mine).description: Increases trigger and blast radius of Spider Mines.

Progressive Replenishable Magazine (Vult.description:
Level 1: Allows Vultures to replace used Spider Mines. Costs 15 minerals.
Level 2: Replacing used Spider Mines no longer costs minerals.

Multi-Lock Weapons System (Goliath).description: Goliaths can attack both ground and air targets simultaneously.

Ares-Class Targeting System (Goliath).description: Increases Goliath ground attack range by 1 and air by 3.

Progressive Tri-Lithium Power Cell (Diam.description:
Level 1: Tri-Lithium Power Cell: Increases Diamondback attack range by 1.
Level 2: Tungsten Spikes: Increases Diamondback attack range by 3.

Maelstrom Rounds (Siege Tank).description: Siege Tanks do an additional 40 damage to the primary target in Siege Mode.

Shaped Blast (Siege Tank).description: Reduces splash damage to friendly targets while in Siege Mode by 75%.

Rapid Deployment Tube (Medivac).description: Medivacs deploy loaded troops almost instantly.

Advanced Healing AI (Medivac).description: Medivacs can heal two targets at once.

Progressive Tomahawk Power Cells (Wraith.description:
Level 1: Tomahawk Power Cells: Increases Wraith starting energy by 100.
Level 2: Unregistered Cloaking Module: Wraiths do not require energy to cloak and remain cloaked.

Displacement Field (Wraith).description: Wraiths evade 20% of incoming attacks while cloaked.

Ripwave Missiles (Viking).description: Vikings do area damage while in Fighter Mode.

Phobos-Class Weapons System (Viking).description: Increases Viking attack range by 1 in Assault mode and 2 in Fighter mode.

Progressive Cross-Spectrum Dampeners (Ba.description:
Level 1: Banshees can remain cloaked twice as long.
Level 2: Banshees do not require energy to cloak and remain cloaked.

Shockwave Missile Battery (Banshee).description: Banshees do area damage in a straight line.

Progressive Missile Pods (Battlecruiser).description:
Battlecruisers gain the Missile Pods ability, 
which deals damage to air units in a target area.
        Level 1: Deals 40 damage (+50 vs light).
        Level 2: Deals 110 damage and costs -50 less energy.

Progressive Defensive Matrix (Battlecrui.description:
Level 1: Spell. For 20 seconds the Battlecruiser gains a shield that can absorb up to 200 damage.
Level 2: Passive. Battlecruiser gets 200 shields.

Ocular Implants (Ghost).description: Increases Ghost sight range by 3 and attack range by 2.

Crius Suit (Ghost).description: Cloak no longer requires energy to activate or maintain.

Psionic Lash (Spectre).description: Spell. Deals 200 damage to a single target.

Nyx-Class Cloaking Module (Spectre).description: Cloak no longer requires energy to activate or maintain.

330mm Barrage Cannon (Thor).description:
Improves 250mm Strike Cannons ability to deal area damage and stun units in a small area.
Can be also freely aimed on ground.

Progressive Immortality Protocol (Thor).description:
Level 1: Allows destroyed Thors to be reconstructed on the field. Costs Vespene Gas.
Level 2: Thors are automatically reconstructed after falling for free.

Advanced Ballistics (Liberator).description: Increases Liberator range by 3 in Defender Mode.

Raid Artillery (Liberator).description: Allows Liberators to attack structures while in Defender Mode.

Drilling Claws (Widow Mine).description: Allows Widow Mines to burrow and unburrow faster.

Concealment (Widow Mine).description: Burrowed Widow Mines are no longer revealed when the Sentinel Missile is on cooldown.

Trigger Override (Wraith).description: Wraith attack speed increases by 10% with each attack, up to a maximum of 100%.

Internal Tech Module (Wraith).description: Wraiths can be trained from a Starport without an attached Tech Lab.

Shredder Rounds (Viking).description: Attacks in Assault mode do line splash damage.

W.I.L.D. Missiles (Viking).description: Launches 5 rockets at the target unit. Each rocket does 25 (40 vs armored) damage.

Advanced Targeting Optics (Banshee).description: Increases Banshee attack range by 2 while cloaked.

Distortion Blasters (Banshee).description: Increases Banshee attack damage by 25% while cloaked.

Rocket Barrage (Banshee).description:
Banshees gain the Rocket Barrage ability, 
which deals 75 damage to enemy ground units in the target area.

Resource Efficiency (Ghost).description: Reduces Ghost cost by 25 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Resource Efficiency (Spectre).description: Reduces Spectre cost by 25 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Laser Targeting System (Thor).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Large Scale Field Construction (Thor).description: Allows Thors to be built by SCVs like a structure.

Durable Materials (Raven).description: Extends timed life duration of Raven's summoned objects.

Improved Nano-Repair (Science Vessel).description: Nano-Repair no longer requires energy to use.

Advanced AI Systems (Science Vessel).description: Science Vessel can use Nano-Repair at two targets at once.

Resource Efficiency (Cyclone).description: Reduces Cyclone cost by 25 minerals, 50 gas, and 1 supply.

Laser Targeting System (Banshee).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Internal Tech Module (Banshee).description: Banshees can be trained from a Starport without an attached Tech Lab.

Tactical Jump (Battlecruiser).description: Allows Battlecruisers to warp to a target location anywhere on the map.

Cloak (Battlecruiser).description: Allows Battlecruisers to use the Cloak ability.

ATX Laser Battery (Battlecruiser).description:
Battlecruisers can attack while moving, 
do the same damage to both ground and air targets, and fire faster.

Internal Tech Module (Battlecruiser).description: Battlecruisers can be trained from a Starport without an attached Tech Lab.

EMP Rounds (Ghost).description:
Spell. Does 100 damage to shields and drains all energy from units in the targeted area. 
Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.

Lockdown (Ghost).description: Spell. Stuns a target mechanical unit for a long time.

Impaler Rounds (Spectre).description: Spectres do additional damage to armored targets.

Progressive High Impact Payload (Thor).description:
Level 1: Allows Thors to transform in order to use an alternative air attack.
Level 2: Increases transformation speed between modes.

Bio Mechanical Repair Drone (Raven).description: Spell. Deploys a drone that can heal biological or mechanical units.

Spider Mines (Raven).description: Spell. Deploys 3 Spider Mines to a target location.

Railgun Turret (Raven).description: Spell. Allows Ravens to deploy an advanced Auto-Turret, that can attack enemy ground units in a straight line.

Hunter-Seeker Weapon (Raven).description: Allows Ravens to attack with a Hunter-Seeker weapon.

Interference Matrix (Raven).description: Spell. Target enemy Mechanical or Psionic unit can't attack or use abilities for a short duration.

Anti-Armor Missile (Raven).description: Spell. Decreases target and nearby enemy units armor by 2.

Internal Tech Module (Raven).description: Ravens can be trained from a Starport without an attached Tech Lab.

EMP Shockwave (Science Vessel).description: Spell. Depletes all energy and shields of all units in a target area.

Defensive Matrix (Science Vessel).description: Spell. Provides a target unit with a defensive barrier that can absorb up to 250 damage.

Targeting Optics (Cyclone).description: Increases Cyclone Lock On casting range and the range while Locked On.

Rapid Fire Launchers (Cyclone).description: The first 12 shots of Lock On are fired more quickly.

Cloak (Liberator).description: Allows Liberators to use the Cloak ability.

Laser Targeting System (Liberator).description: Increases vision by 2 and weapon range by 1.

Black Market Launchers (Widow Mine).description: Increases Widow Mine Sentinel Missile range.

Executioner Missiles (Widow Mine).description:
Reduces Sentinel Missile cooldown.
When killed, Widow Mines will launch several missiles at random enemy targets.

Enhanced Cluster Launchers (Valkyrie).description: Valkyries fire 2 additional rockets each volley.

Flechette Missiles (Valkyrie).description: Equips Valkyries with Air-to-Surface missiles to attack ground units.

Afterburners (Valkyrie).description: Ability. Temporarily increases the Valkyries's movement speed by 70%.

Internal Tech Module (Cyclone).description: Cyclones can be trained from a Factory without an attached Tech Lab.

Internal Fusion Module (Hercules).description: Hercules can be trained from a Starport without having a Fusion Core.

Tactical Jump (Hercules).description: Allows Hercules to warp to a target location anywhere on the map.

Progressive Augmented Thrusters (Planeta.description:
Level 1: Lift Off - Planetary Fortress can lift off.
Level 2: Armament Stabilizers - Planetary Fortress can attack while lifted off.

Advanced Targeting (Planetary Fortress).description: Planetary Fortress can attack air units.

Launching Vector Compensator (Valkyrie).description: Allows Valkyries to shoot air while moving.

Resource Efficiency (Valkyrie).description: Reduces Valkyrie cost by 100 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Vespene Synthesis (Predator).description: Gives 1 free Vespene per target hit with Lightning Field.

Orbital Module (Planetary Fortress).description: Allows Planetary Fortresses to use Scanner Sweep, MULE, and Extra Supplies if those abilities are owned.

Concussive Grenades (Devastator Turret).description: Devastator Turrets slow enemies they hit. Does not stack with Marauder Concussive Shells.

Anti-Armor Munitions (Devastator Turret).description: Increases Devastator Turret damage to armored targets by 10.

Resource Efficiency (Devastator Turret).description: Reduces Devastator Turret cost by 50 minerals.

Resource Efficiency (Missile Turret).description: Reduces Missile Turret cost by 25 minerals.

Bunker.description: Defensive structure. Able to load infantry units, giving them +1 range to their attacks.

Sensor Tower.description: Reveals locations of enemy units at long range.

Devastator Turret.description: Defensive structure. Deals increased damage to armored targets. Attacks ground units.

Ultra-Capacitors (Terran).description: Increases attack speed of units by 5% per weapon upgrade.

Vanadium Plating (Terran).description: Increases the life of units by 5% per armor upgrade.

Automated Refinery (Terran).description: Eliminates the need for SCVs in vespene gas production.

Command Center Reactor (Command Center).description: Command Centers can train two SCVs at once.

Science Vessel.description: Aerial Caster unit. Can repair mechanical units.

Tech Reactor (Terran).description: Merges Tech Labs and Reactors into one add on structure to provide both functions.

Orbital Strike (Terran).description: Trained units from Barracks are instantly deployed on rally point.

Shrike Turret (Bunker).description: Adds an automated turret to Bunkers.

Planetary Fortress.description:
Allows Command Centers to upgrade into a defensive structure with a turret and additional armor.
Planetary Fortresses cannot Lift Off, or cast Orbital Command spells.

Perdition Turret.description: Automated defensive turret. Burrows down while no enemies are nearby.

Predator.description: Anti-infantry specialist that deals area damage with each attack.

Cellular Reactor (Terran).description: All Terran spellcasters get +100 starting and maximum energy.

Progressive Regenerative Bio-Steel (Terr.description:
Allows Terran mechanical units to regenerate health while not in combat.
Each level increases life regeneration speed.

Hive Mind Emulator.description: Defensive structure. Can permanently Mind Control Zerg units.

Psi Disrupter.description: Defensive structure. Slows the attack and movement speeds of all nearby Zerg units.

Structure Armor (Terran).description: Increases armor of all Terran structures by 2.

Hi-Sec Auto Tracking (Terran).description: Increases attack range of all Terran structures by 1.

Advanced Optics (Terran).description: Increases attack range of all Terran mechanical units by 1.

Rogue Forces (Terran/Zerg).description: Mercenary calldowns are no longer limited by charges.

Mercenary Munitions (Terran).description: Increases attack speed of all combat units by 15%.

Fast Delivery (Terran/Zerg).description: Mercenary calldowns can be deployed right at the mission start.

Rapid Reinforcement (Terran/Zerg).description: Reduces cooldowns of mercenary calldowns by 60s.

Zealot.description: Powerful melee warrior. Can use the charge ability.

Stalker.description: Ranged attack strider. Can use the Blink ability.

High Templar.description: Potent psionic master. Can use the Feedback and Psionic Storm abilities. Can merge into an Archon.

Dark Templar.description: Deadly warrior-assassin. Permanently cloaked. Can use the Shadow Fury ability.

Immortal.description: Assault strider. Can use Barrier to absorb damage.

Colossus.description: Battle strider with a powerful area attack. Can walk up and down cliffs. Attacks set fire to the ground, dealing extra damage to enemies over time.

Phoenix.description: Air superiority starfighter. Can use Graviton Beam and Phasing Armor abilities.

Void Ray.description: Surgical strike craft. Has the Prismatic Alignment and Prismatic Range abilities.

Carrier.description: Capital ship. Builds and launches Interceptors that attack enemy targets. Repair Drones heal nearby mechanical units.

Tactical Jump (Science Vessel).description: Allows Science Vessels to warp to a target location anywhere on the map.

Compressed Rocket Fuel (Liberator).description: Increases Liberator attack range in Fighter mode by 4.

Field-Assist Target System (Battlecruise.description: Battlecruisers increase the attack range of nearby friendly ground units by 1.

Adaptive Defenses (Predator).description: Predators gain a shield that halves incoming ranged and splash damage while active.

Additional Starting Minerals.description: Increases the starting minerals for all missions.

Additional Starting Vespene.description: Increases the starting vespene for all missions.

Additional Starting Supply.description: Increases the starting supply for all missions.

Nothing.description: Does nothing. Used to remove a location from the game.

Ghost Visor (Nova Equipment).description: Reveals the locations of enemy units in the fog of war around Nova. Can detect cloaked units.

Rangefinder Oculus (Nova Equipment).description: Increases Nova's vision range and non-melee weapon attack range by 2. Also increases range of melee weapons by 1.

Domination (Nova Ability).description: Gives Nova the ability to mind-control a target enemy unit.

Blink (Nova Ability).description: Gives Nova the ability to teleport a short distance and cloak for 10s.

Progressive Stealth Suit Module (Nova Su.description:
Level 1: Gives Nova the ability to cloak.
Level 2: Nova is permanently cloaked.

Energy Suit Module (Nova Suit Module).description: Increases Nova's maximum energy and energy regeneration rate.

Armored Suit Module (Nova Suit Module).description: Increases Nova's health by 100 and armour by 1. Nova also regenerates life quickly out of combat.

Jump Suit Module (Nova Suit Module).description: Increases Nova's movement speed and allows her to jump up and down cliffs.

C20A Canister Rifle (Nova Weapon).description: Allows Nova to equip the C20A Canister Rifle, which has a ranged attack and allows Nova to cast Snipe.

Hellfire Shotgun (Nova Weapon).description: Allows Nova to equip the Hellfire Shotgun, which has a short-range area attack in a cone and allows Nova to cast Penetrating Blast.

Plasma Rifle (Nova Weapon).description: Allows Nova to equip the Plasma Rifle, which has a rapidfire ranged attack and allows Nova to cast Plasma Shot.

Monomolecular Blade (Nova Weapon).description: Allows Nova to equip the Monomolecular Blade, which has a melee attack and allows Nova to cast Dash Attack.

Blazefire Gunblade (Nova Weapon).description: Allows Nova to equip the Blazefire Gunblade, which has a melee attack and allows Nova to cast Fury of One.

Stim Infusion (Nova Gadget).description: Gives Nova the ability to heal herself and temporarily increase her movement and attack speeds.

Pulse Grenades (Nova Gadget).description: Gives Nova the ability to throw a grenade dealing large damage in an area.

Flashbang Grenades (Nova Gadget).description: Gives Nova the ability to throw a grenade to stun enemies and disable detection in a large area.

Ionic Force Field (Nova Gadget).description: Gives Nova the ability to shield herself temporarily.

Holo Decoy (Nova Gadget).description: Gives Nova the ability to summon a decoy unit which enemies will prefer to target and takes reduced damage.

Tac Nuke Strike (Nova Ability).description: Gives Nova the ability to launch tactical nukes built from the Shadow Ops.

Zergling.description: Fast inexpensive melee attacker. Hatches in pairs from a single larva. Can morph into a Baneling.

Swarm Queen.description: Ranged support caster. Can use the Spawn Creep Tumor and Rapid Transfusion abilities.

Roach.description: Durable short ranged attacker. Regenerates life quickly when burrowed.

Baneling Aspect (Zergling).description: Anti-ground suicide unit. Does damage over a small area on death. Morphed from the Zergling.

Aberration.description: Durable melee attacker that deals heavy damage and can walk over other units.

Mutalisk.description: Fragile flying attacker. Attacks bounce between targets.

Swarm Host.description: Siege unit that attacks by rooting in place and continually spawning Locusts.

Infestor.description: Support caster that can move while burrowed. Can use the Fungal Growth, Parasitic Domination, and Consumption abilities.

Ultralisk.description: Massive melee attacker. Has an area-damage cleave attack.

Spore Crawler.description: Anti-air defensive structure that can detect cloaked units.

Corruptor.description: Anti-air flying attacker specializing in taking down enemy capital ships.

Scourge.description: Flying anti-air suicide unit. Hatches in pairs from a single larva.

Brood Queen.description: Flying support caster. Can cast the Ocular Symbiote and Spawn Broodlings abilities.

Defiler.description: Support caster. Can use the Dark Swarm, Consume, and Plague abilities.

Infested Marine.description: General-purpose Infested infantry. Has a timed life of 90 seconds.

Infested Bunker.description: Defensive structure. Periodically spawns Infested infantry that fight from inside. Acts as a mobile ground transport while uprooted.

Nydus Worm.description: Long-range transport network. Nydus Worms and Nydus Networks can load friendly ground units to be unloaded to any other Nydus structure on the map.

Omega Worm.description: Long-range deployable base. Unable to load and unload units, but can generate Creep and Creep Tumors. Can also serve as a dropoff point for resources and can create Drones.

Infested Siege Tank.description: Siege tank. Can uproot itself to provide mobile tank support.

Infested Diamondback.description: Fast, high-damage attacker. Can attack while moving and can bring flying units to the ground.

Infested Banshee.description: Tactical-strike aircraft. Can cloak and can be upgraded to burrow.

Infested Liberator.description: Anti-Air flying attacker.  Attacks deal high area-damage.

Progressive Zerg Melee Attack.description:
Increases damage of Zerg melee ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Missile Attack.description:
Increases damage of Zerg ranged ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Ground Carapace.description:
Increases armor of Zerg ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Flyer Attack.description:
Increases damage of Zerg flyers.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Flyer Carapace.description:
Increases armor of Zerg flyers.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Weapon Upgrade.description:
Increases damage of Zerg units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases armor of Zerg units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Ground Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Zerg ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Flyer Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Zerg flyers.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Zerg Weapon/Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Zerg units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Hydriodic Bile (Roach).description: Roaches deal +8 damage to light targets.

Adaptive Plating (Roach).description: Roaches gain +3 armour when their life is below 50%.

Tunneling Claws (Roach).description: Allows Roaches to move while burrowed.

Frenzy (Hydralisk).description: Allows Hydralisks to use the Frenzy ability, which increases their attack speed by 50%.

Corrosive Acid (Baneling).description: Increases the damage banelings deal to their primary target. Splash damage remains the same.

Rupture (Baneling).description: Increases the splash radius of baneling attacks.

Regenerative Acid (Baneling).description: Banelings will heal nearby friendly units when they explode.

Vicious Glaive (Mutalisk).description: Mutalisks attacks will bounce an additional 3 times.

Rapid Regeneration (Mutalisk).description: Mutalisks will regenerate quickly when out of combat.

Sundering Glaive (Mutalisk).description: Mutalisks deal increased damage to their primary target.

Burrow (Swarm Host).description: Allows Swarm Hosts to burrow instead of root to spawn locusts.

Rapid Incubation (Swarm Host).description: Swarm Hosts will spawn locusts 20% faster.

Pressurized Glands (Swarm Host).description: Allows Swarm Host Locusts to attack air targets.

Burrow Charge (Ultralisk).description: Allows Ultralisks to burrow and charge at enemy units, knocking back and stunning units when it emerges.

Tissue Assimilation (Ultralisk).description: Ultralisks recover health when they deal damage.

Caustic Spray (Corruptor).description: Allows Corruptors to use the Caustic Spray ability, which deals ramping damage to buildings over time.

Corruption (Corruptor).description: Allows Corruptors to use the Corruption ability, which causes a target enemy unit to take increased damage.

Swarm Scourge (Scourge).description: An extra Scourge will be built from each egg at no additional cost.

Shredding Claws (Zergling).description: Zergling attacks will temporarily reduce their target's armour to 0.

Resource Efficiency (Hydralisk).description: Reduces Hydralisk cost by 25 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Centrifugal Hooks (Baneling).description: Increases the movement speed of Banelings.

Tunneling Jaws (Baneling).description: Allows Banelings to move while burrowed.

Severing Glaive (Mutalisk).description: Mutalisk bounce attacks will deal full damage.

Aerodynamic Glaive Shape (Mutalisk).description: Increases the attack range of Mutalisks by 2.

Enduring Locusts (Swarm Host).description: Increases the duration of Swarm Hosts' Locusts by 10s.

Resource Efficiency (Swarm Host).description: Reduces Swarm Host cost by 100 minerals and 25 gas.

Resource Efficiency (Ultralisk).description: Reduces Ultralisk cost by 100 minerals and 2 supply.

Corrosive Spray (Devourer).description: Devourer attacks will now deal area damage.

Improved Osmosis (Devourer).description: Devourer's Acid Spores duration increased by 50%.

Prescient Spores (Devourer).description: Allows Devourers to attack ground targets.

Primal Adaptation (Guardian).description: Allows Guardians to attack air units with a decreased attack damage.

Soronan Acid (Guardian).description: Guardians deal increased damage to ground targets.

Secretion Glands (Impaler).description: Impalers generate creep while standing still or burrowed.

Adapted Spines (Lurker).description: Lurkers deal increased damage to non-light targets.

Potent Bile (Ravager).description: Ravager Corrosive Bile deals an additional +40 damage.

Bloated Bile Ducts (Ravager).description: Ravager Corrosive Bile hits a much larger area.

Deep Tunnel (Ravager).description:
Ravagers gain the Deep Tunnel ability, 
which allows them to burrow to any visible location on the map.

Parasitic Bomb (Viper).description:
Vipers gain the Parasitic Bomb ability, 
which inflicts an area-damaging effect on an enemy air unit.

Paralytic Barbs (Viper).description: Viper Abduct stuns units for an additional 5 seconds.

Porous Cartilage (Brood Lord).description: Brood Lords gain increased movement speed.

Evolved Carapace (Brood Lord).description: Brood Lords gain +100 life and +1 armor.

Splitter Mitosis (Brood Lord).description: Brood Lord attacks spawn twice as many broodlings.

Resource Efficiency (Brood Lord).description: Reduces Brood Lord cost by 75 gas.

Infested Terran (Infestor).description: Infestors gain the Spawn Infested Terran ability.

Microbial Shroud (Infestor).description:
Infestors gain the Microbial Shroud ability, 
which reduces incoming damage from air units in an area.

Spawn Larvae (Swarm Queen).description: Swarm Queens gain the Spawn Larvae ability.

Deep Tunnel (Swarm Queen).description: Swarm Queens gain the Deep Tunnel ability.

Bio-Mechanical Transfusion (Swarm Queen).description: Swarm Queen Burst Heal heals an additional +10 life and can now target mechanical units.

Resource Efficiency (Swarm Queen).description: Reduces Swarm Queen cost by 50 gas.

Incubator Chamber (Swarm Queen).description: Swarm Queens may now be built two at a time from the Hatchery, Lair, or Hive.

Fungal Growth (Brood Queen).description: Brood Queens gain the Fungal Growth ability.

Ensnare (Brood Queen).description: Brood Queens gain the Ensnare ability.

Enhanced Mitochondria (Brood Queen).description: Brood Queens start with maximum energy and gain increased energy regeneration. Like powerhouses (of the cell).

Pathogen Projectors (Defiler).description: Defilers gain +4 cast range for Dark Swarm and Plague.

Trapdoor Adaptation (Defiler).description: Defilers can now use abilities while burrowed.

Predatory Consumption (Defiler).description: Defilers can now use Consume on any non-heroic biological unit, not just friendly Zerg.

Comorbidity (Defiler).description: Plague now stacks up to three times, and depletes energy as well as health.

Protective Cover (Aberration).description: Aberrations grant damage reduction to allied units directly beneath them.

Resource Efficiency (Aberration).description: Reduces Aberration cost by 50 minerals and 25 gas.

Scourge Incubation (Corruptor).description: Corruptors spawn 2 Scourge upon death (3 with Swarm Scourge).

Resource Efficiency (Corruptor).description: Reduces Corruptor cost by 50 minerals and 25 gas.

Concentrated Fire (Primal Igniter).description: Primal Igniters deal +15 damage vs light armor.

Primal Tenacity (Primal Igniter).description: Primal Igniters gain +100 health and +1 armor.

Sustained Cultivation Ventricles (InfSCV.description: Starting Infested SCV charges increased to 3. Maximum charges increased to 5.

Plagued Munitions (Infested Marine).description: Infested Marines deal an extra 50 damage over 15 seconds to targets they attack.

Regenerative Plating (Infested Bunker).description: Infested Bunkers gain increased life regeneration while rooted.

Engorged Bunkers (Infested Bunker).description: Infested Bunkers gain +2 cargo slots. Infested Trooper spawn cooldown is reduced by 20%.

Raptor Strain (Zergling).description: Allows Zerglings to jump up and down cliffs and leap onto enemies. Also increases Zergling attack damage by 2.

Swarmling Strain (Zergling).description: Zerglings will spawn instantly and with an extra Zergling per egg at no additional cost.

Vile Strain (Roach).description: Roach attacks will slow the movement and attack speed of enemies.

Corpser Strain (Roach).description: Units killed after being attacked by Roaches will spawn 2 Roachlings.

Impaler Aspect (Hydralisk).description: Allows Hydralisks to morph into Impalers.

Lurker Aspect (Hydralisk).description: Allows Hydralisks to morph into Lurkers.

Splitter Strain (Baneling).description: Banelings will split into two smaller Splitterlings on exploding.

Hunter Strain (Baneling).description: Allows Banelings to jump up and down cliffs and leap onto enemies.

Brood Lord Aspect (Mutalisk/Corruptor).description: Allows Mutalisks and Corruptors to morph into Brood Lords.

Viper Aspect (Mutalisk/Corruptor).description: Allows Mutalisks and Corruptors to morph into Vipers.

Carrion Strain (Swarm Host).description: Swarm Hosts will spawn Flying Locusts.

Creeper Strain (Swarm Host).description: Allows Swarm Hosts to teleport to any creep on the map in vision. Swarm Hosts will spread creep around them when rooted or burrowed.

Noxious Strain (Ultralisk).description: Ultralisks will periodically spread poison, damaging nearby biological enemies.

Torrasque Strain (Ultralisk).description: Ultralisks will revive after being killed.

Tyrant's Protection (Tyrannozor).description: Tyrannozors grants nearby friendly units 2 armor.

Barrage of Spikes (Tyrannozor).description: Unleash a Barrage of Spikes, dealing 100 damage to enemy ground and air units around the Tyrannozor.

Impaling Strike (Ultralisk/Tyrannozor).description: Ultralisk and Tyrannozor melee attacks have a 20% chance to stun for 2 seconds.

Healing Adaptation (Ultralisk/Tyrannozor.description: Ultralisks and Tyrannozors regenerate life quickly when out of combat.

Subterranean Scales (Nydus Worm/Omega Wo.description: Increases Nydus Worm and Omega Worm maximum health by 250 and armor by 1.

Jormungandr Strain (Nydus Worm/Omega Wor.description: Removes emerge time for Nydus Worm and Omega Worm, and allows them to be salvaged, returning the cost spent on them.

Resource Efficiency (Nydus Worm/Omega Wo.description: Reduces Nydus Worm and Omega Worm cost by 50 minerals and 75 gas.

Ouroboros Strain (Omega Worm).description: Allows Omega Worms to train a limited assortment of combat units (Zerglings, Roachs, Hydralisks, and Aberrations) at a reduced time and cost.

Ravenous Appetite (Nydus Worm).description: Allows Nydus Worms to unload and load units nearly instantly.

Progressive Automated Mitosis (Infested.description:
Level 1: Infested Siege Tanks generate 1 Volatile Biomass every 30 seconds.
Level 2: Infested Siege Tanks generate 1 Volatile Biomass every 10 seconds.

Acidic Enzymes (Infested Siege Tank).description: Infested Siege Tanks deal an additional 15 damage to armored units and structures in both modes.

Deep Tunnel (Infested Siege Tank).description:
Infested Siege Tanks gain the Deep Tunnel ability, 
which allows them to burrow to any visible location on the map covered in creep.

Saturated Cultures (Infested Diamondback.description: Infested Diamondbacks leave behind a trail of acid when moving that deals 20 damage per second to enemy units.

Caustic Mucus (Infested Diamondback).description: Reduces the cooldown of the Infested Diamondback's Fungal Snare by 15 seconds.

Rapid Hibernation (Infested Banshee).description: Infested Banshees regenerate 20 life and energy per second while burrowed.

Cloud Dispersal (Infested Liberator).description: Infested Liberators instantly transform into a cloud of microscopic organisms while attacking, reducing the damage they take by 85%.

Viral Contamination (Infested Liberator).description: Increases the damage Infested Liberators deal to their primary target by 100%.

Kinetic Blast (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan deals 300 damage to target unit or structure from long range.

Heroic Fortitude (Kerrigan Passive).description: Kerrigan gains +200 maximum life and double life regeneration rate.

Leaping Strike (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan leaps to her target and deals 150 damage.

Crushing Grip (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan stuns enemies in a target area for 3 seconds and deals 30 damage over time. Heroic units are not stunned.

Chain Reaction (Kerrigan Passive).description: Kerrigan's attacks deal normal damage to her target then jump to additional nearby enemies.

Psionic Shift (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan dashes through enemies, dealing 50 damage to all enemies in her path.

Zergling Reconstitution (Zerg).description: Killed Zerglings respawn from your primary Hatchery at no cost.

Improved Overlords (Overlord).description: Overlords morph instantly and provide 50% more supply.

Automated Extractors (Zerg).description: Extractors automatically harvest Vespene Gas without the need for Drones.

Wild Mutation (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan gives all units in an area +200 max life and double attack speed for 10 seconds.

Spawn Banelings (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan spawns six Banelings with timed life.

Mend (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan heals for 150 life and heals nearby friendly units for 50 life. An additional +50% life is healed over 15 seconds.

Twin Drones (Zerg).description: Drones morph in groups of two at no additional cost and require less supply.

Malignant Creep (Zerg).description: Your units and structures gain increased life regeneration and 30% increased attack speed while on creep. Creep Tumors also spread creep faster and farther.

Infest Broodlings (Kerrigan Passive).description: Enemies damaged by Kerrigan become infested and will spawn Broodlings with timed life if killed quickly.

Fury (Kerrigan Passive).description: Each of Kerrigan's attacks temporarily increase her attack speed by 15%. Can stack up to 75%.

Ability Efficiency (Kerrigan Passive).description: Kerrigan's abilities have their cooldown and energy cost reduced by 20%.

Apocalypse (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan deals 300 damage (+400 vs Structure) to enemies in a large area.

Spawn Leviathan (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan summons a mightly flying Leviathan with timed life. Deals massive damage and has energy-based abilities.

Drop-Pods (Kerrigan Ability).description: Kerrigan drops Primal Zerg forces with timed life to the battlefield.

Primal Form (Kerrigan).description: Kerrigan takes on her Primal Zerg form and gains greatly increased energy regeneration.

Creep Stomach (Zerg).description: Zerg buildings no longer take damage off-creep. Spore and Spine Crawlers can now root off-creep.

Infested Medics.description: Mercenary infested Medics that may be called in from the Predator Nest.

Infested Siege Breakers.description: Mercenary infested Siege Breakers that may be called in from the Predator Nest.

Infested Dusk Wings.description: Mercenary infested Dusk Wings that may be called in from the Predator Nest.

Hunter Killers.description: Elite Hydralisks that may be called in from the Predator Nest.

Ventral Sacs (Overlord).description: Overlords gain the ability to transport ground units.

Generate Creep (Overlord).description: Overlords gain the ability to generate creep while standing still.

Frightful Fleshwelder (Zerg).description: Reduces infested mechnical unit resource cost by 30%.

Guardian Aspect (Mutalisk/Corruptor).description: Long-range anti-ground flyer. Can attack ground units. Morphed from the Mutalisk or Corruptor.

Devourer Aspect (Mutalisk/Corruptor).description: Anti-air flyer. Attack inflict Acid Spores. Can attack air units. Morphed from the Mutalisk or Corruptor.

Ravager Aspect (Roach).description: Ranged artillery. Can use Corrosive Bile. Can attack ground units. Morphed from the Roach.

Overseer Aspect (Overlord).description: Allows to morph Overlords into Overseers. Overseers can use Spawn Creep Tumor and Contaminate abilities.

Primal Igniter Aspect (Roach).description: Assault unit. Has an area-damage attack. Regenerates life quickly when burrowed. Can attack ground units. Morphed by merging two Roaches.

Tyrannozor Aspect (Ultralisk).description: Heavy assault beast. Has a ground-area attack, and powerful anti-air attack. Morphed by merging two Ultralisks.

Observer.description: Flying spy. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection.

Centurion.description: Powerful melee warrior. Has the Shadow Charge and Darkcoil abilities.

Sentinel.description: Powerful melee warrior. Has the Charge and Reconstruction abilities.

Supplicant.description: Powerful melee warrior. Has powerful damage resistant shields.

Instigator.description: Ranged support strider. Can store multiple Blink charges.

Slayer.description: Ranged attack strider. Can use the Phase Blink and Phasing Armor abilities.

Sentry.description: Robotic support unit can use the Guardian Shield ability and restore the shields of nearby Protoss units.

Energizer.description: Robotic support unit. Can use the Chrono Beam ability and become stationary to power nearby structures.

Havoc.description: Robotic support unit. Can use the Target Lock and Force Field abilities and increase the range of nearby Protoss units.

Signifier.description: Potent permanently cloaked psionic master. Can use the Feedback and Crippling Psionic Storm abilities. Can merge into an Archon.

Ascendant.description: Potent psionic master. Can use the Psionic Orb, Mind Blast, and Sacrifice abilities.

Avenger.description: Deadly warrior-assassin. Permanently cloaked. Recalls to the nearest Dark Shrine upon death.

Blood Hunter.description: Deadly warrior-assassin. Permanently cloaked. Can use the Void Stasis ability.

Dragoon.description: Ranged assault strider. Has enhanced health and damage.

Dark Archon.description: Potent psionic master. Can use the Confuse and Mind Control abilities.

Adept.description: Ranged specialist. Can use the Psionic Transfer ability.

Warp Prism.description: Flying transport. Can carry units and become stationary to deploy a power field.

Annihilator.description: Assault Strider. Can use the Shadow Cannon ability to damage air and ground units.

Vanguard.description: Assault Strider. Deals splash damage around the primary target.

Wrathwalker.description: Battle strider with a powerful single target attack. Can walk up and down cliffs.

Reaver.description: Area damage siege unit. Builds and launches explosive Scarabs for high burst damage.

Disruptor.description: Robotic disruption unit. Can use the Purification Nova ability to deal heavy area damage.

Mirage.description: Air superiority starfighter. Can use Graviton Beam and Phasing Armor abilities.

Corsair.description: Air superiority starfighter. Can use the Disruption Web ability.

Destroyer.description: Area assault craft. Can use the Destruction Beam ability to attack multiple units at once.

Tempest.description: Siege artillery craft. Attacks from long range. Can use the Disintegration ability.

Mothership.description: Ultimate Protoss vessel, Can use the Vortex and Mass Recall abilities. Cloaks nearby units and structures.

Arbiter.description: Army support craft. Has the Stasis Field and Recall abilities. Cloaks nearby units.

Oracle.description: Flying caster. Can use the Revelation and Stasis Ward abilities.

Stalwart.description: Assault strider. Has shields that deflect high-damage attacks.

Warp Ray.description: Surgical-strike craft. Damage output increases the longer the Warp Ray remains on target.

Dawnbringer.description: Flying Anti-Surface Assault Ship. Attacks in an area around the target. Attack count increases as it continues firing.

Skylord.description: Capital ship. Fires a powerful laser that deals damage in a line. Can use Tactical Jump ability.

Trireme.description: Capital ship. Builds and launches Bombers that attack enemy targets.

Progressive Protoss Ground Weapon.description:
Increases damage of Protoss ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Ground Armor.description:
Increases armor of Protoss ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Shields.description:
Increases shields of Protoss units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Air Weapon.description:
Increases damage of Protoss starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Air Armor.description:
Increases armor of Protoss starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Weapon Upgrade.description:
Increases damage of Protoss units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases armor of Protoss units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Ground Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Protoss ground units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Air Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Protoss starships.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Progressive Protoss Weapon/Armor Upgrade.description:
Increases damage and armor of Protoss units.
Must be researched during the mission if the mission type isn't set to auto-unlock generic upgrades.

Photon Cannon.description: Protoss defensive structure. Can attack ground and air units.

Khaydarin Monolith.description: Advanced Protoss defensive structure. Has superior range and damage, but is very expensive and attacks slowly.

Shield Battery.description: Protoss defensive structure. Restores shields to nearby friendly units and structures.

Blood Shield (Supplicant).description: Increases the armor value of Supplicant shields.

Shockwave (Adept).description: When Adepts deal a finishing blow, their projectiles can jump onto 2 additional targets.

Disintegrating Particles (Stalker/Instig.description: Increases weapon damage of Stalkers, Instigators, and Slayers.

Particle Reflection (Stalker/Instigator/.description: Attacks fired by Stalkers, Instigators, and Slayers have a chance to bounce to additional targets for reduced damage.

Trillic Compression System (Dragoon).description: Dragoons gain +20 life and their shield regeneration rate is doubled. Allows Dragoons to regenerate shields in combat.

Combat Sensor Array (Scout).description: Scouts gain +3 range against air and +1 range against ground.

Advanced Photon Blasters (Scout).description: Scouts gain increased damage against ground targets.

Tectonic Destabilizers (Tempest).description: Tempests deal increased damage to buildings.

Quantic Reactor (Tempest).description: Tempests deal increased damage to massive units.

Gravity Sling (Tempest).description: Tempests gain +8 range against air targets and +8 cast range.

Ionic Wavelength Flux (Phoenix/Mirage/Sk.description: Increases Phoenix, Mirage, and Skirmisher weapon damage by +2.

Anion Pulse-Crystals (Phoenix/Mirage/Ski.description: Increases Phoenix, Mirage, and Skirmiser range by +2.

Argus Jewel (Corsair).description: Corsairs can store 2 charges of disruption web.

Stasis Calibration (Oracle).description: Enemies caught by the Oracle's Stasis Ward may now be attacked.

Temporal Acceleration Beam (Oracle).description: Oracles no longer need to to spend energy to attack.

Chronostatic Reinforcement (Arbiter).description: Arbiters gain +50 maximum life and +1 armor.

Khaydarin Core (Arbiter).description: Arbiters gain +150 starting energy and +50 maximum energy.

Spacetime Anchor (Arbiter).description: Allows Arbiters to use an alternate version of Stasis Field which lasts 50 seconds longer.

Graviton Catapult (Carrier/Trireme).description: Carriers and Triremes can launch Interceptors and Bombers more quickly.

Flux Vanes (Void Ray/Destroyer/Warp Ray/.description: Increases movement speed of Void Ray variants.

Resource Efficiency (Destroyer).description: Reduces Destroyer cost by 50 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Gravitic Drive (Warp Prism).description: Increases the movement speed of Warp Prisms.

Phase Blaster (Warp Prism).description: Equips Warp Prisms with an auto-attack that can hit ground and air targets.

War Configuration (Warp Prism).description: Warp Prisms transform faster and gain increased power radius in Phasing Mode.

Solarite Payload (Reaver).description: Reaver Scarabs gain increased splash damage radius.

Resource Efficiency (Reaver).description: Reduces Reaver cost by 100 minerals, 100 gas, and 2 supply.

Singularity Charge (Immortal/Annihilator.description: Increases Immortal, Annihilator, and Stalwart attack range by +2.

Advanced Targeting Mechanics (Immortal/A.description: Immortals, Annihilators, and Stalwarts can attack air units.

Rapid Power Cycling (Wrathwalker).description: Reduces the charging time and increases attack speed of the Wrathwalker's Charged Blast.

Shroud of Adun (Dark Templar/Avenger/Blo.description: Increases Dark Templar, Avenger, and Blood Hunter maximum shields by +80.

Shadow Guard Training (Dark Templar/Aven.description: Increases Dark Templar, Avenger, and Blood Hunter maximum life by +40.

Blink (Dark Templar/Avenger/Blood Hunter.description: Dark Templar, Avengers, and Blood Hunters gain the Blink ability.

Resource Efficiency (Dark Templar/Avenge.description: Reduces Dark Templar, Avenger, and Blood Hunter cost by 50 gas.

Dark Archon Meld (Dark Templar).description: Allows 2 Dark Templar to meld into a Dark Archon.

Unshackled Psionic Storm (High Templar/S.description: High Templar and Signifiers deal increased damage with Psi Storm.

Hallucination (High Templar/Signifier).description:
High Templar and Signifiers gain the Hallucination ability, 
which creates 2 hallucinated copies of a target unit.

Khaydarin Amulet (High Templar/Signifier.description: High Templar and Signifiers gain +150 starting energy and +50 maximum energy.

High Archon (Archon).description: Archons can use High Templar abilities.

Feedback (Dark Archon).description:
Dark Archons gain the Feedback ability, 
which drains all energy from a target and deals 1 damage per point of energy drained.

Maelstrom (Dark Archon).description:
Dark Archons gain the Maelstrom ability, 
which stuns biological units in an area.

Argus Talisman (Dark Archon).description: Dark Archons gain +150 starting energy and +50 maximum energy.

Power Overwhelming (Ascendant).description: Ascendants gain the ability to sacrifice Supplicants for increased shields and spell damage.

Chaotic Attunement (Ascendant).description: Ascendants' Psionic Orbs gain 25% increased travel distance.

Blood Amulet (Ascendant).description: Ascendants gain +150 starting energy and +50 maximum energy.

Cloaking Module (Sentry/Energizer/Havoc).description: Sentries, Energizers, and Havocs become permanently cloaked.

Rapid Recharging (Sentry/Energizer/Havoc.description: Sentries, Energizers, and Havocs gain +100% energy regeneration rate.

Force Field (Sentry).description: Sentries gain the Force Field ability.

Hallucination (Sentry).description:
Sentries gain the Hallucination ability, 
which creates hallucinated versions of Protoss units.

Detect Weakness (Havoc).description: Havocs' Target Lock gives an additional +15% damage bonus.

Bloodshard Resonance (Havoc).description: Havoc gain increased range for Squad Sight, Target Lock, and Force Field.

Leg Enhancements (Zealot/Sentinel/Centur.description: Zealots, Sentinels, and Centurions gain increased movement speed.

Shield Capacity (Zealot/Sentinel/Centuri.description: Zealots, Sentinels, and Centurions gain +30 maximum shields.

Bosonic Core (Oracle).description: Increases starting energy by 150 and maximum energy by 50.

Resource Efficiency (Scout).description: Reduces Scout cost by 125 minerals, 25 gas, and 1 supply.

Disruptor Dispersion (Immortal/Annihilat.description: Immortals, Annihilators, and Stalwarts deal minor splash damage.

Perfected Power (Disruptor).description: Allows Purification Nova to hit air units. Bonus damage to shields is now baseline for enemies (friendly damage unaffected).

Restrained Destruction (Disruptor).description: Purification Nova does 50% reduced damage to friendly units and structures.

Interplanetary Range (Tempest).description: Tempests gain +8 weapon range against all targets.

Anti-Surface Countermeasures (Dawnbringe.description: Dawnbringers take reduced damage from non-spell ground sources.

Whirlwind (Zealot).description: Zealot War Council upgrade. Gives Zealots the whirlwind ability, dealing damage in an area over 3 seconds.

Resource Efficiency (Centurion).description: Centurion War Council upgrade. Reduces Centurion cost by 50 gas.

Resource Efficiency (Sentinel).description: Sentinel War Council upgrade. Reduces Sentinel cost by 60 minerals and 1 supply.

Phase Reactor (Stalker).description: Stalker War Council upgrade. Stalkers restore 80 shields over 5 seconds after they Blink.

Phalanx Suit (Dragoon).description: Dragoon War Council upgrade. Dragoons gain +1 range, move slightly faster, and can form tighter formations.

Resource Efficiency (Instigator).description: Instigator War Council upgrade. Reduces Instigator cost by 40 minerals and 15 gas.

Disruptive Transfer (Adept).description: Adept War Council upgrade. Adept shades apply a debuff to enemies they touch, increasing damage taken by +5.

Phase Blink (Slayer).description: Slayer War Council upgrade. Slayers can now blink. After blinking, the Slayer's next attack within 8 seconds deals double damage.

Kryhas Cloak (Avenger).description: Avenger War Council upgrade. Avengers are now permanently cloaked.

Lesser Shadow Fury (Dark Templar).description: Dark Templar War Council upgrade. Dark Templar gain two strikes of their Shadow Fury ability.

Greater Shadow Fury (Dark Templar).description: Dark Templar War Council upgrade. Dark Templar gain three strikes of their Shadow Fury ability.

Brutal Efficiency (Blood Hunter).description: Blood Hunter War Council upgrade. Blood Hunters attack over twice as quickly.

Double Shield Recharge (Sentry).description: Sentry War Council upgrade. Sentries can heal the shields of two targets at once.

Mobile Chrono Beam (Energizer).description: Energizer War Council upgrade. Allows Energizers to use Chrono Beam in Mobile Mode.

Enduring Sight (Havoc).description: Havoc War Council upgrade. Havoc Squad Sight stays up indefinitely and no longer takes energy.

Plasma Surge (High Templar).description: High Templar War Council upgrade. High Templar Psionic Storm will heal fiendly protoss shields under it.

Feedback (Signifier).description:
Signifier War Council upgrade. Signifiers gain the Feedback ability, 
which drains all energy from a target and deals 1 damage per point of energy drained.

Ability Efficiency (Ascendant).description: Ascendant War Council upgrade. Ascendant spells cost -25 energy.

Indomitable Will (Dark Archon).description: Dark Archon War Council upgrade. Casting Mind Control will no longer deplete the Dark Archon's shields.

Improved Barrier (Immortal).description: Immortal War Council upgrade. The Immortal's Barrier ability absorbs an additional +100 damage.

Rapid-Fire Cannon (Vanguard).description: Vanguard War Council upgrade. Vanguards attack 38% faster.

Fusion Mortars (Vanguard).description: Vanguard War Council upgrade. Vanguards deal +7 damage to armored targets per attack.

Aerial Tracking (Annihilator).description: Annihilator War Council upgrade. The Annihilator's Shadow Cannon ability can now target air units.

Duality Charge (Stalwart).description: Stalwart War Council upgrade. Stalwarts gain +4 range.

Fire Lance (Colossus).description: Colossus War Council upgrade. Colossi set the ground on fire with their attacks, dealing damage to enemies over time.

Aerial Tracking (Wrathwalker).description: Wrathwalker War Council upgrade. Wrathwalkers can now target air units.

Khalai Replicators (Reaver).description: Reaver War Council upgrade. Reaver Scarabs no longer cost minerals.

Restructured Thrusters (Disruptor).description: Disruptor War Council upgrade. Allows the Disruptor to move while casting Purification Nova. Also allows the Disruptor to Blink.

Warp Refraction (Warp Prism).description: Warp Prism War Council upgrade. Warp Prisms gain +5 pickup range and unload units 10 times faster.

Induce Scopophobia (Observer).description:
Observer War Council upgrade. Observers gain the Induce Scopophobia ability, 
which reduces the attack and movement speed of an enemy by 20%.

Double Graviton Beam (Phoenix).description: Phoenix War Council upgrade. Phoenixes can now use Graviton Beam to lift two targets at once.

Network Disruption (Corsair).description: Corsair War Council upgrade. Triples the radius of Disruption Web.

Graviton Beam (Mirage).description: Mirage War Council upgrade. Allows Mirages to use Graviton Beam.

Peer Contempt (Skirmisher).description: Skirmisher War Council upgrade. Allows Skirmishers to target air units.

Prismatic Range (Void Ray).description: Void Ray War Council upgrade. Void Rays gain increased range as they charge their beam.

Reforged Bloodshard Core (Destroyer).description: Destroyer War Council upgrade. When fully charged, the Destroyer's Destruction Beam weapon does full damage to secondary targets.

Solarite Lens (Dawnbringer).description: Dawnbringer War Council upgrade. Dawnbringers gain +2 range.

Repair Drones (Carrier).description: Carrier War Council upgrade. Carriers gain 2 repair drones which heal nearby mechanical units.

Hyperjump (Skylord).description:
Skylord War Council upgrade. Skylords gain the Hyperjump ability, 
which teleports the skylord to any location on the map..

Solar Beam (Trieme).description: Trireme War Council upgrade. Triremes gain an anti-air laser attack that deals more damage over time.

Disintegration (Tempest).description:
Tempest War Council upgrade. Tempests gain the Disintegration ability, 
which deals 500 damage to a target unit or structure over 20 seconds.

Ability Efficiency (Arbiter).description: Arbiter War Council upgrade. Reduces the energy cost of Recall by 50 and Stasis Field by 100.

Chrono Surge (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun increases a target structure's unit warp in and research speeds by +1000% for 20 seconds.

Progressive Proxy Pylon (Spear of Adun C.description:
Level 1: The Spear of Adun quickly warps in a Pylon to a target location.
Level 2: The Spear of Adun warps in a Pylon, 2 melee warriors, and 2 ranged warriors to a target location.

Pylon Overcharge (Spear of Adun Calldown.description: The Spear of Adun temporarily gives a target Pylon increased shields and a powerful attack.

Orbital Strike (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun fires 5 laser blasts from orbit.

Temporal Field (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun creates 3 temporal fields that freeze enemy units and structures in time.

Solar Lance (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun strafes a target area with 3 laser beams.

Mass Recall (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun warps all units in a target area back to the primary Nexus and gives them a temporary shield.

Shield Overcharge (Spear of Adun Calldow.description: The Spear of Adun gives all friendly units a shield that absorbs 200 damage. Lasts 20 seconds.

Deploy Fenix (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun drops Fenix onto the battlefield. Fenix is a powerful warrior who will fight for 30 seconds.

Purifier Beam (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun fires a wide laser that deals large amounts of damage in a moveable area. Lasts 15 seconds.

Time Stop (Spear of Adun Calldown).description: The Spear of Adun freezes all enemy units and structures in time for 20 seconds.

Solar Bombardment (Spear of Adun Calldow.description: The Spear of Adun fires 200 laser blasts randomly over a wide area.

Matrix Overload (Protoss).description: All friendly units gain 25% movement speed and 15% attack speed within a Pylon's power field and for 15 seconds after leaving it.

Quatro (Protoss).description: All friendly Protoss units gain the equivalent of their +1 armour, attack, and shield upgrades.

Nexus Overcharge (Protoss).description: The Protoss Nexus gains a long-range auto-attack.

Orbital Assimilators (Protoss).description: Assimilators automatically harvest Vespene Gas without the need for Probes.

Warp Harmonization (Protoss).description: Stargates and Robotics Facilities can transform to utilize Warp In technology. Warp In cooldowns are 20% faster than original build times.

Guardian Shell (Spear of Adun Auto-Cast).description: The Spear of Adun passively shields friendly Protoss units before death, making them invulnerable for 5 seconds. Each unit can only be shielded once every 60 seconds.

Reconstruction Beam (Spear of Adun Auto-.description: The Spear of Adun will passively heal mechanical units for 5 and non-biological structures for 10 life per second. Up to 3 targets can be repaired at once.

Overwatch (Spear of Adun Auto-Cast).description: Once per second, the Spear of Adun will last-hit a damaged enemy unit that is below 50 health.

Superior Warp Gates (Protoss).description: Protoss Warp Gates can hold up to 3 charges of unit warp-ins.

Optimized Ordnance (Protoss).description: Increases the attack speed of Protoss defensive structures by 25%.

Khalai Ingenuity (Protoss).description: Pylons, Photon Cannons, Monoliths, and Shield Batteries warp in near-instantly.
